data.name: Phyla-Vell
data.description: Phyla-Vell and her partner Moondragon help form the Infinity Watch, with Phyla-Vell's Quantum Sword crushing enemies and bolstering the team's defenses.

starItems.name: Phyla-Vell
starItems.description: Phyla-Vell and her partner Moondragon help form the Infinity Watch, with Phyla-Vell's Quantum Sword crushing enemies and bolstering the team's defenses.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

If Moondragon is an ally, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

If Moondragon is an ally, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

If Moondragon is an ally, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to secondary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If Moondragon is an ally, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If Moondragon is an ally, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If Moondragon is an ally, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If Moondragon is an ally, this attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
If Adam Warlock is an ally, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If Adam Warlock is an ally, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing.
3.nextUpgrade:
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from all other allies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from all other allies.

Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If Adam Warlock is an ally, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from all other allies.

Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If Adam Warlock is an ally, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from all other allies.

Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If Adam Warlock is an ally, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects from all other allies.

Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. If Adam Warlock is an ally, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies for an additional <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

If primary target has any positive effect apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. If primary target has any positive effect apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. If primary target has any positive effect apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. If primary target has any positive effect apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. If primary target has any positive effect apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. If primary target has any positive effect apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>150%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies. If primary target has any positive effect apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain. While any ally has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, that ally gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
Lower enemy Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>5%</color> while this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain. While any ally has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, that ally gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
Lower enemy Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>5%</color> while this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for self
Increase Drain by +<color=#86e619>15%</color> for self or allies with <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain. While any ally has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, that ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
Lower enemy Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>5%</color> while this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies
Lower enemy Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>10%</color>

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain. While any ally has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, that ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
Lower enemy Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>15%</color> while this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Increase Drain by +<color=#86e619>25%</color> for self or allies with <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain. While any ally has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, that ally gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
Lower enemy Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>15%</color> while this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
